dmca.title: The Fur Flies Over Pelt PR
dmca.body:
From: [Private] [mailto:[Private]]
Sent: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 9:31 AM
To: [Private]
Subject: copyright infringement


Good morning--
 
Our IT department recently Googled "Fabulous Furs" and saw this page on your web site -- http://www.jeanettecrews.com/detail.cfm?ID=2435.  The page references an Item name of "Fabulous Furs".
 
Our company shares the same name and has a copyright on its use.  We would appreciate it if you would stop using this term as it belongs to us.  We hope that you were simply unaware and will remove this item and its promotion from all of your marketing efforts.
 
Sincerely--
 
[Private]
 
[Private]

Director of Marketing

Donna Salyers' Fabulous Furs,  Inc.

[Private]

Covington, Kentucky [Private]
P [Private]    F  [Private]
